about_the_game:
You are the FORKLIFT FLOWERPOT: a modern marvel of engineering perfection.

Drive, Sail, and Fork your way around a strange archipelago and study plants across different climates and times. Change between three seasons at your whim to solve puzzles and navigate between islands. Meet wacky characters, participate in local sporting events, and delve deep into the mysteries of a strange land.

Features

  • Drive and sail around to explore a lush 2.5D claymation-inspired archipelago.
  • Change between three strange seasons to solve puzzles and navigate your way between islands.
  • Use THE WEB to connect clues and unearth the conspiracy at the heart of Spudbubby's Speedy Shipping Company.


  • In Windy Season, gusts from the Accordion Isles race across the land, opening new paths for exploration.
  • During Wet Season, a heavy rainfall from Mt.Springly covers the land and provides crucial nourishment for plant life.
  • At Harvest Season's peak, you'll find a variety of bouncy mushrooms, fruiting plants, and ANGRY BOSSES WONDERING WHY YOU HAVEN'T REPORTED FOR YOUR HARVEST SEASON WORK SHIFT!


  • Play a deckbuilding card game with the giant tomato gods that oversee the land.
  • Draft a variety of powerful cards to grow your garden and secure victory.
  • Sneak in and steal fruits from your opponents garden, you know you want to!

name: FORKLIFT FLOWERPOT

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities
  • DirectX: Version 12

short_description: Change between three seasons on a strange archipelago to solve puzzles, quiet-quit your forklift job, and dismantle the potato-dominated shipping industry. When you're done exploring, kick back and play a deckbuilding card game in a wild attempt to dethrone your local Gods.
